translations: 瘟疫（尤指鼠疫）；有害的事物

sentences.sentence: In an age of modern medical miracles, it seems impossible that mankind has yet to rid itself of these pestilences.
sentences.translation: 在现今医疗技术近乎奇迹的时代，人类却尚未摆脱这些传染病，这似乎是件不可能的事。

sentences.sentence: Many pestilences broke out during that period and demonstrated some characteristics in the aspects of time and space distribution.
sentences.translation: 空间分布上呈现出南方比北方多，东部比西部多的特征。

sentences.sentence: But we have not seen the earthquakes and famines and pestilences (incurable disease) occur at the same time in diverse places, like they are happening around us right now.
sentences.translation: 但是我们不曾看见过地震、饥荒、瘟疫(即绝症)在同一时间的不同地区发生，如同我们现今的时代中在我们周围所发生的。
